title: Nicola Roberts Is Having a Baby!
summary: Nicola Roberts, a singer from the band Girls Aloud, has shared exciting news: she is going to have her first baby. She is five months pregnant and will have the baby in spring. Nicola posted a photo on Instagram showing her baby bump with a Christmas tree. She and her partner, Mitch Hahn, are very happy and told their families on Christmas Day. Many friends, including other singers and comedians, congratulated them in the comments. Nicola is also acting in a musical called Hadestown in London, but she will finish that job in January. Girls Aloud had a big tour last year, and they remembered their friend Sarah Harding who passed away. Nicola has been in the band for over 20 years since they won a TV show.

background_read: Nicola Roberts is a singer from the UK who became famous as part of Girls Aloud, a pop band that started in 2002 after winning a TV talent show. The band had five members and made many hit songs. They stopped performing together for a while but came back for a tour in 2023. Nicola also makes her own music and acts in plays. Having a baby is a big life event where parents prepare for a new family member, often sharing joy with friends and family through social media like Instagram.
